get.summary: The Reference-Data API permits interaction with existing custom data tables associated with your company. You can use the API's GET /v2/reference-data/{dataset}/records call to return specified data loaded from other processes for targeting and personalization.

parameters.name: api-user
parameters.description: your company name in Yesmail application

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: The specific {dataset} from which data is to be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to be returned with the request. Valid values are integers 0-100. The default is 25.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of rows to be bypassed by the request. Valid values are 0-any positive integer. The default is 0.

parameters.name: columnname
parameters.description: Valid values are the display names of any column in the dataset. These are filters on the set of records in the result set. Example firstname=John&postalcode=12345
